mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(`id`) from `messagerecord` where `uid`=#{userId} and `type`=1 and `stype` in(1,2) and `state`=1;
SELECT count(`id`) FROM `messagerecord` WHERE `rdcid` IN (SELECT r.id FROM `rdc` AS r WHERE `userid`=#{userId}) and `isread`=0
SELECT * FROM `messagerecord` WHERE `rdcid` IN (SELECT r.id FROM `rdc` AS r WHERE `userid`=#{userId}) and `isread`=0 order by `addtime` desc
SELECT * FROM `messagerecord` WHERE `rdcid` IN (SELECT r.id FROM `rdc` AS r WHERE `userid`=#{userId}) and `isread`=0 order by `addtime` desc limit 5;
